description:
Momotarou fights demons with his animal friends. A wise priest heals illness in exchange for buckwheat. A priest has a disgusting nose.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momotarou / Soba Gaki Oshou / Hana to Asagayu
Momotarou / The Buckwheat Dumpling Priest / The Nose and Morning Porridge
桃太郎 / そばがき和尚 / 鼻と朝粥
